moves.1. e4: Keep it simple... don't want to confuse Kev too early.
moves.1... e6: Massive blunder from black... he should have offered a draw.
moves.2. d4: Just do anything... sooner or later Kev will give up his queen.
moves.3. exd5: Better take it... with less pieces Kev might move quicker.
moves.4. Nf3: Just so Kev knows for sure the pawn is protected... by 2 pieces !!
moves.4... c5: Too late for queen's gambit now.
moves.6. Nc3: Surely he won't run king side.
moves.6... Qf5: A little more rope I think.
moves.7... Qf6: No phone call from the governor.
